body.p: I saw & dressed McDowell's would immediatly after he was shot -- Aug 5th -- The ball entered his back, right side, striking the 11th Dorsal Rib & detaching it from its corresponding vertebra, then passing upward & inward, & burrying itself -- as I think -- in one of the deep seated muscles of the spine -- I considered all dangers of immediate ^death^ passed after 48 hours -- I so expressed myself -- he continued to slowly improve up to Aug 10th the day of trial -- when when I was discharged --
I then entertained no doubts of his ultimate recovery --
